thag5.6:5.1: It was truly for my benefit
thag5.6:5.2: that the Buddha went to the river Nerañjara.
thag5.6:6.1: I used to perform a diverse spectrum of sacrifices;
thag5.6:6.4: I was a blind, ordinary person.
thag5.6:7.1: Caught in the thicket of wrong view,
thag5.6:8.3: I serve the truly worthy flame:
thag5.6:8.4: I bow to the Realized One.
thag5.6:9.4: now there are no more future lives.
